title: Space and robotics event ends at Cuet
body: The Andromeda Space & Robotics Research Organization (ASRO) of Chittagong University of Engineering and Technology successfully concluded its flagship event, ASRONOVA'23, on December 8. The event, held at the Cuet Central Auditorium, was attended by Cuet Vice-Chancellor Professor Dr Mahmud Abdul Matin Bhuiyan as the chief guest. The event welcomed new members and showcased ASRO's recent innovations, including the Starloop Rocket Launching Project, the Bus Tracking Project, the Swarm Drone Project, and the Telescope Project, says a press release. The organisation honoured two teams that represented Cuet in international events -- the NASA Space Apps Challenge and the Global Space Challenge. Prizes were also distributed to the winners of the Circuit Olympiad 2025.
